Class RSA

  • java.lang.Object
    • RSA

  • public class RSA
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that does all the major work, in junction with the Person class
    Author:
    Joe Cardona, Samantha Brech, Spencer Escalante

      RSA() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static long inverse(long e, long m)
      Find the multiplicative inverse of a long e (mod m)
      static java.lang.String longTo2Chars(long[] x)
      takes the decrypted longs and converts them back into a string representing the initial plaintext This method is different than the original api where it takes the entire array of longs and returns the plaintext string instead of the output of two characters in string form
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      static long modPower(long b, long p, long m)
      Raise b to the power of p (mod m)
      static long randPrime(int m, int n, java.util.Random rand)
      returns a random prime number between the boundaries of m and n
      static long relPrime(long n, java.util.Random rand, int limit) 
      static void show(long[] cipher)
      Display an array of longs on stdout
      static long[] toLong(java.lang.String msg)
      Takes in a String message and turns it into an array of longs blocking two characters at a time so the blocked letters would be at indexes 0,1 then 2,3 and so on to length-2, length-1 This method is different than the original api in that it takes in the entire message instead of just two characters in the form of a string

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public static long inverse(long e,
                           long m)
        Find the multiplicative inverse of a long e (mod m)
        Parameters:
        e - the encryption exponent
        m - the mod
        Returns:
        the multiplicative inverse

      • modPower

        public static long modPower(long b,
                            long p,
                            long m)
        Raise b to the power of p (mod m)
        Parameters:
        b - the base number
        p - the exponent to raise the base
        m - the mod
        Returns:
        the result of the power (mod m)

      • longTo2Chars

        public static java.lang.String longTo2Chars(long[] x)
        takes the decrypted longs and converts them back into a string representing the initial plaintext This method is different than the original api where it takes the entire array of longs and returns the plaintext string instead of the output of two characters in string form
        Parameters:
        x - array of longs that represent the decrypted characters still in long form
        Returns:

      • toLong

        public static long[] toLong(java.lang.String msg)
        Takes in a String message and turns it into an array of longs blocking two characters at a time so the blocked letters would be at indexes 0,1 then 2,3 and so on to length-2, length-1 This method is different than the original api in that it takes in the entire message instead of just two characters in the form of a string
        Parameters:
        msg -
        Returns:
        array of blocked longs representing the message inputed

        rand -
        Returns:
